info.title: NHS England APIM Base API Definitions
info.description: High level summary of FHIR api's used within NHS England API programmes

/metadata.summary: Access to the Server's Capability Statement
/metadata.description: All FHIR Servers return a CapabilityStatement that describes what services they perform

get.summary: Return the server's capability statement

/Appointment.summary: manage the collection of resources of type Appointment
/Appointment.description: Access to services to manage the collection of all resources of type Appointment

get.summary: Search all resources of type Appointment based on a set of criteria

parameters.name: practitioner:identifier
parameters.description: - [Booking and Referral - FHIR API](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/booking-and-referral-fhir)

/Appointment/{rid}.summary: Read/Write/etc resource instance of type Appointment
/Appointment/{rid}.description: Access to services to manage the state of a single resource of type Appointment

get.summary: Read the current state of the resource

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

/DocumentReference.summary: Manager for resources of type DocumentReference
/DocumentReference.description: The Manager for resources of type DocumentReference: provides services to manage the collection of all the DocumentReference instances

get.summary: Search all resources of type DocumentReference based on a set of criteria

parameters.name: subject:identifier
parameters.description:
- [Booking and Referral - FHIR API](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/booking-and-referral-fhir) 
 - [National Record Locator - FHIR API v3](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/national-record-locator-fhir/v3/producer) 

 International and Care Connect API suggest using patient instead of subject, this would also be consistent with other NHS England API's

parameters.name: custodian:identifier
parameters.description: - [Booking and Referral - FHIR API](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/booking-and-referral-fhir)

parameters.name: next-page-token
parameters.description: - [Booking and Referral - FHIR API](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/booking-and-referral-fhir)

parameters.name: based-on:identifier
parameters.description: - This may not be correct and is inferred from A005 [e-Referral Service - FHIR API](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/e-referral-service-fhir)

requestBody.description: The new state of the resource

200.description: the resource being returned after being updated

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

get.summary: Read the current state of the resource

requestBody.description: The new state of the resource

200.description: the resource being returned after being updated

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

delete.summary: Delete the resource so that it no exists (no read, search etc)

204.description: If the resource is deleted - no content is returned

parameters.name: HealthcareService.providedBy
parameters.description: - [Booking and Referral - FHIR API](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/booking-and-referral-fhir) believe this should be `organization:identifier`

/Organization.summary: manage the collection of resources of type Organization
/Organization.description: Access to services to manage the collection of all resources of type Organization

get.summary: Search all resources of type Organization based on a set of criteria

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description: e-Referral FHIR API

parameters.name: Organization.identifier
parameters.description: - [Booking and Referral - FHIR API](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/booking-and-referral-fhir) believe this should be `identifier`

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: - [Organisation Data Service - FHIR API](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/organisation-data-service-fhir)

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: - [Organisation Data Service - FHIR API](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/organisation-data-service-fhir)

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: - [Organisation Data Service - FHIR API](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/organisation-data-service-fhir)

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: - [Organisation Data Service - FHIR API](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/organisation-data-service-fhir)

parameters.name: address-country
parameters.description: - [Organisation Data Service - FHIR API](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/organisation-data-service-fhir)

parameters.name: ods-role
parameters.description: - [Organisation Data Service - FHIR API](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/organisation-data-service-fhir) EPS expects this data to be `type`

parameters.name: ods-lastChangeDate
parameters.description: - [Organisation Data Service - FHIR API](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/organisation-data-service-fhir) FHIR developers would expect this to be `_lastUpdated`

parameters.name: ods-activeRole
parameters.description: - [Organisation Data Service - FHIR API](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/organisation-data-service-fhir) concerned we have two searches on an extension

parameters.description: - [Organisation Data Service - FHIR API](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/organisation-data-service-fhir)

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: - [Organisation Data Service - FHIR API](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/organisation-data-service-fhir)

parameters.description: - [Organisation Data Service - FHIR API](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/organisation-data-service-fhir)

/Patient.summary: manage the collection of resources of type Patient
/Patient.description: Access to services to manage the collection of all resources of type Patient

get.summary: Search all resources of type Patient based on a set of criteria

parameters.name: _fuzzy-match
parameters.description: PDS using non standard parameter

parameters.name: _exact-match
parameters.description: PDS is using non standard parameter. Do not believe this is :exact from [modifiers](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/r4/search.html#modifiers) although it sounds similar and may cause confusion

parameters.name: _history
parameters.description: PDS is using non standard parameter. Do not believe this is _history from [history](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/r4/http.html#history) this probably results in confusion for developers

parameters.name: _max-results
parameters.description: PDS is using non standard parameter. PDS probably should be using _count [_count](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/r4/search.html#count) which should be ok as PDS does not support paging

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: A search by NHS Number. Missing from PDS is a read operation instead - so using transient id instead of identifier

parameters.name: address-postcode
parameters.description: PDS is using non standard parameter - **will be deprecated in the future**

parameters.name: general-practitioner
parameters.description: A search by ODS Code. PDS SHOULD be using `general-practitioner:identifier` with `token` type to follow NHS Digital FHIR policy. It is workable as it is but this is searching on an `id` which is transient (changeable), searching on `identifier` is recommended.

/Patient/{rid}.summary: Read/Write/etc resource instance of type Patient
/Patient/{rid}.description: Access to services to manage the state of a single resource of type Patient

get.summary: Read the current state of the resource

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

/Practitioner.summary: manage the collection of resources of type Practitioner
/Practitioner.description: Access to services to manage the collection of all resources of type Practitioner

get.summary: Search all resources of type Practitioner based on a set of criteria

parameters.name: _query
parameters.description: - e-Referral FHIR API

/PractitionerRole.summary: manage the collection of resources of type PractitionerRole
/PractitionerRole.description: Access to services to manage the collection of all resources of type PractitionerRole

get.summary: Search all resources of type PractitionerRole based on a set of criteria

parameters.name: practitioner:identifier
parameters.description: [e-Referral FHIR API](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/e-referral-service-fhir) - This parameter is NOT present but is believed to be implied. This API is believed to be NOT CONFORMANT as the api as currently stated should return all PractitionreRole's held by eRS and this is clearly not correct.

/RelatedPerson.summary: manage the collection of resources of type RelatedPerson
/RelatedPerson.description: Access to services to manage the collection of all resources of type RelatedPerson

get.summary: Search all resources of type RelatedPerson based on a set of criteria

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: A search by NHS Number. Proxy query parameter and not supported on PDS

parameters.name: patient:identifier
parameters.description: A search by NHS Number. Proxy uses query parameter and PDS uses path parameter

/ServiceRequest.description: Access to services to manage the collection of all resources of type ServiceRequest

get.summary: Search all resources of type ServiceRequest based on a set of criteria

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: - e-Referral FHIR API

parameters.name: patient:identifier
parameters.description:
- [e-Referral Service Patient Care](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/e-referral-service-patient-care-fhir)) 
 - [Booking and Referral - FHIR API](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/booking-and-referral-fhir)

parameters.name: ServiceRequest.identifier
parameters.description: - [Booking and Referral - FHIR API](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/booking-and-referral-fhir) believe this should be `identifier` same as eRS

/ServiceRequest/{rid}.summary: Read/Write/etc resource instance of type ServiceRequest
/ServiceRequest/{rid}.description: Access to services to manage the state of a single resource of type ServiceRequest

get.summary: Read the current state of the resource

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

/Slot.summary: manage the collection of resources of type Slot
/Slot.description: Access to services to manage the collection of all resources of type Slot

get.summary: Search all resources of type Slot based on a set of criteria

summary.name: _summary
summary.description: Requests the server to return a designated subset of the resource

format.name: _format
format.description: Specify alternative response formats by their MIME-types (when a client is unable acccess accept: header)

pretty.name: _pretty
pretty.description: Ask for a pretty printed response for human convenience

elements.name: _elements
elements.description: Requests the server to return a collection of elements from the resource

count.name: _count
count.description: The maximum number of search results on a page. The server is not bound to return the number requested, but cannot return more
